entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING, Carberry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:00 p.m. CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow mixed with freezing drizzle. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow or freezing drizzle. Local blowing snow. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 5:53 PM CDT Wednesday 19 April 2023
